title: Half life 2 content for gmod NON STEAM
description:
WARNING/CAUTION!!! IT'S DESIGNED FOR GMOD V13.06.07

(link for that game: www.gaddons.org on the right side there should be a "LINK" section) 

its a content....so basically you can play HL2 online or singleplayer with it

Install: put in installation folder (where you installed gmod) it should be NEXT to garrysmod folder *NOT IN garrysmod folder..) and in game you should go in gamemodes
(which should be next to language section...i mean on the left side of it) and you should find "half life 2".... there should be a tick!! if not then tick it... and DONE you have hl2 on gmod
